General.Name: Pyrum Innovations AG
General.Description: Pyrum Innovations AG develops, builds, and operates recycling plants for used tires worldwide. It recycles used tires and produces secondary raw materials, such as rubber granules, carbon/recovered carbon black, thermolysis oils, and steel wires. Pyrum Innovations AG was founded in 2008 and is headquartered in Dillingen, Germany.
